author: Rebecca Klar
title: Michigan mayor calls on commissioner who joined protest against coronavirus restrictions to resign
description: A Michigan mayor is calling on a city commissioner to resign after the official joined protests of the statewide stay-at-home order put in place to mitigate the spread of the coronavirus outbreak. ...
content:
A Michigan mayor is calling on a city commissioner to resign after the official joined protests of the statewide stay-at-home order put in place to mitigate the spread of the coronavirus outbreak.
